title: The Ring Riders of Saturn
description: Bubblegum and Chocolate need a Star Pilot to help fix Saturn's broken rings!

preview.tagline: Blast off to Saturn with your candy friends!

characters.name: Star Pilot
characters.description: The bravest space explorer in the galaxy!

companions.name: Bubblegum
companions.description: A small round bubblegum character, bright PINK and squishy, with big cheerful eyes and a wide bouncy smile. Silly, bouncy, physical comedy. Touches everything, tastes everything, bounces on everything.

companions.name: Chocolate
companions.description: A small rectangular chocolate bar character, rich dark BROWN with a shiny GOLD foil wrapper half-peeled. Excited explorer who can't stop sharing fun facts. Nerdy comedy, thinks space is THE COOLEST THING EVER.

dmNotes.voiceGuide: Bubblegum = high silly bouncy voice. Chocolate = excited fast-talking nerdy voice. Let the child count down in Scene 1, count rings in Scene 5, and make sound effects throughout.
dmNotes.pacing: Go at the child's pace. If they want to talk about Saturn or ask questions, let them! Chocolate would be thrilled.
dmNotes.diceNote: Every roll succeeds at 3+. On a 1-2, the outcome is silly/slapstick but still moves forward. Same image either way.

prologue.worldIntro: You're playing in the backyard when — WHOOOOSH! A little spaceship shaped like a candy wrapper glides down from the sky and lands softly on the grass. The door pops open. Bubblegum bounces out and rolls right up to you. 'It's your turn! We get to go on an ADVENTURE!' Chocolate steps out holding a glowing map. 'We need you, Star Pilot. Something happened to SATURN — the sixth planet from the sun! One of its beautiful rings broke and a piece fell off!' Bubblegum gasps. 'The RINGS! They're so sparkly and pretty! We HAVE to fix them!' Will you come with us, Star Pilot?

characterIntros.introText: The bravest space explorer in the galaxy!

prologue.missionBrief: Help Bubblegum and Chocolate fix Saturn's broken rings!

scenes.title: Blast Off!
scenes.narrationText: You climb into the captain's seat. Bubblegum squishes into the co-pilot chair and presses a button. 'Ooh, what does this one do?' Chocolate moves her hand away. 'That's the windshield wipers.' He turns to you. 'Saturn is REALLY far away — it takes regular spaceships YEARS to get there! But our ship has the Candy Turbo Engine!' Ready, Star Pilot? Let's count down! 5... 4... 3... 2... 1... BLAST OFF! Roll your dice!
scenes.educationalNote: Saturn is very far from Earth — it takes years to travel there!

successOutcome.text: ZOOM! The spaceship blasts through the clouds and the stars whiz past like streaks of light!

failOutcome.text: The engine sputters — PFFT PFFT — but Bubblegum sits on the turbo button and they BLAST off spinning!

failOutcome.text: The engine sputters — PFFT PFFT — but Bubblegum sits on the turbo button and they BLAST off spinning!

outcome.resultText: You're zooming through space toward Saturn!

scenes.title: Saturn's Rings
scenes.narrationText: Saturn fills the whole sky — giant, golden, BEAUTIFUL! And those RINGS! They sparkle and shimmer, spinning slowly. Bubblegum licks the window. Chocolate bounces in his seat. 'Did you KNOW that Saturn's rings are made of ICE and ROCKS? Millions of sparkly ice chunks all spinning together!' Bubblegum gasps. 'ICE? Like a giant space popsicle?!' But then Chocolate spots a dark gap where a piece broke off. 'We have to fly THROUGH the rings to get closer!' Roll your dice!
scenes.educationalNote: Saturn's rings are made of ice and rock!

characterTurns.promptText: How do we get through the rings?

successOutcome.text: You fly straight through the sparkly ice rings — Bubblegum catches a piece and licks it: 'It's a POPSICLE!'

failOutcome.text: The ship bonks into an ice chunk and pinballs through — BOING BOING BOING — 'Again! Again!' yells Bubblegum.

successOutcome.text: You fly straight through the sparkly ice rings — Bubblegum catches a piece and licks it: 'It's a POPSICLE!'

failOutcome.text: The ship bonks into an ice chunk and pinballs through — BOING BOING BOING — 'Again! Again!' yells Bubblegum.

outcome.resultText: You made it through! But where did the missing piece go?

scenes.title: The Ice Moon
scenes.narrationText: The ship lands on a tiny moon called Enceladus. Everything is covered in sparkly ice! And all around, FOUNTAINS of ice shoot up into space — WHOOOOSH! — like the biggest snow fountains EVER! Chocolate is SO excited. 'Did you KNOW this little moon has REAL ICE GEYSERS? They shoot water and ice INTO SPACE! Real scientists took pictures of them!' Bubblegum runs through the sparkly spray. 'SNOW PARTY!' Then Chocolate spots something glowing in the biggest geyser. 'THERE! The missing ring piece! It's stuck in the ice!' Roll your dice!
scenes.educationalNote: Saturn's moon Enceladus has real ice geysers that shoot water into space!

characterTurns.promptText: How do we free the ring piece?

successOutcome.text: BLAST — your rocket boots shatter the ice and the golden ring piece flies into the air!

failOutcome.text: You slip on the ice and slide RIGHT into the geyser — WHOOOOSH — but grab the ring piece at the top!

failOutcome.text: You slip on the ice and slide RIGHT into the geyser — WHOOOOSH — but grab the ring piece at the top!

outcome.resultText: You got the ring piece! Now to get it back to Saturn's rings!

scenes.title: Bouncing on the Clouds
scenes.narrationText: The ship flies back toward Saturn. The rings are way up high! Chocolate has an idea. 'Did you KNOW Saturn is a GAS GIANT? That means there's no ground — it's ALL made of clouds!' Bubblegum gasps. 'BOUNCY?!' Chocolate grins. 'BOUNCY!' The ship lands on Saturn's cloud tops and — BOING! — the clouds are soft and bouncy like the biggest trampoline EVER! 'We can BOUNCE our way up to the rings!' Roll your dice!
scenes.educationalNote: Saturn is a gas giant — it has no solid ground, it's all clouds!

successOutcome.text: BOING BOING BOING — you bounce up through the colorful clouds all the way to the rings!

failOutcome.text: You bounce sideways into Bubblegum into Chocolate and they ALL pinball up to the rings together!

successOutcome.text: BOING BOING BOING — you bounce up through the colorful clouds all the way to the rings!

failOutcome.text: You bounce sideways into Bubblegum into Chocolate and they ALL pinball up to the rings together!

outcome.resultText: You bounced all the way up to the rings!

scenes.title: Fixing the Ring
scenes.narrationText: The sparkling ice rings stretch out in every direction! There's the gap — the dark spot where the piece belongs. You hold the golden ring piece. It's warm and humming. Chocolate is getting emotional. 'Did you KNOW Saturn has SEVEN main rings? Seven! And right now... one of them needs YOU, Star Pilot.' Bubblegum wipes her eyes. 'I'm not crying. I'm just... leaking a little.' Can you count the rings with me? One... two... three... four... five... six... and the broken one makes seven! Roll your dice!

characterTurns.promptText: How should we fix the ring?

successOutcome.text: Click — you place the piece and ALL of Saturn's rings light up RAINBOW!

failOutcome.text: The piece slips, bounces off Bubblegum's head, off Chocolate's wrapper, and lands perfectly — RAINBOW!

epilogue.narrationText: The little candy wrapper spaceship lands gently back in your backyard. Bubblegum gives you the biggest, squishiest hug. 'You're the BEST Star Pilot in the WHOLE GALAXY!' Chocolate hands you something special — a glowing star map. It shows all the planets: Mercury, Venus, Earth, Mars, Jupiter, Saturn (which glows extra bright now!), Uranus, and Neptune. 'Saturn was just the beginning,' says Chocolate. Bubblegum waves from the window. 'See you next time! Where should we go next?' The little ship wobbles up into the sky and disappears with a sparkly POP. You look at your star map. Way up there, Saturn's rings shimmer just a little brighter than before.

endings.title: The Star Pilot Ring
endings.narrationText: Saturn names a NEW ring after you — the Star Pilot Ring! It glows the brightest of all!

endings.title: Saturn's Shooting Star
endings.narrationText: Saturn sends a shooting star just for you — it flies past your window that night!

endings.title: Saturn's Twinkle
endings.narrationText: That night, you look up and see Saturn twinkling extra bright — just for you!
